HmWaitlist.title: HmWaitlist
HmWaitlist.description: Represents a user who has joined the HealthMate waitlist.

name.description: Name of the person joining the waitlist.

email.description: Email address of the person joining the waitlist.

role.description: Role of the person in their organization.

consent.description: Consent given by the person to join the waitlist.

ts.description: Timestamp of when the person joined the waitlist.

HmBriefing.title: HmBriefing
HmBriefing.description: Represents a request for an NDA briefing on HealthMate.

name.description: Name of the person requesting the briefing.

email.description: Email address of the person requesting the briefing.

org.description: Organization of the person requesting the briefing.

website.description: Website of the organization requesting the briefing.

region.description: Region of the person/organization requesting the briefing.

consent.description: Consent given by the person for the briefing request.

ts.description: Timestamp of when the briefing was requested.

HmMediaRequest.title: HmMediaRequest
HmMediaRequest.description: Represents a request for a media kit for HealthMate.

name.description: Name of the person requesting the media kit.

email.description: Email address of the person requesting the media kit.

publication.description: Name of the publication requesting the media kit.

ts.description: Timestamp of when the media kit was requested.

HmTimeline.title: HmTimeline
HmTimeline.description: Represents a milestone in the HealthMate timeline.

date.description: Date or timeframe of the milestone.

HmFaq.title: HmFaq
HmFaq.description: Represents a frequently asked question about HealthMate.

HmPressNote.title: HmPressNote
HmPressNote.description: Represents a press note about HealthMate.

content.description: The content of the press note.

hm_waitlist/{waitlistId}.description: Stores entries for users who have joined the HealthMate waitlist.

hm_briefings/{briefingId}.description: Stores requests for NDA briefings on HealthMate.

hm_media_requests/{mediaRequestId}.description: Stores requests for media kits for HealthMate.

hm_timeline/{timelineId}.description: Stores timeline milestones for HealthMate. Can be managed by an admin.

hm_faq/{faqId}.description: Stores frequently asked questions about HealthMate. Can be managed by an admin.

hm_press_note/{pressNoteId}.description: Stores press notes about HealthMate. Can be managed by an admin.
